# 2005 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 28th RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 2006 for the 2005 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 2006 are as follows.
